author: kou
msg: SvnTestUtil#gc_enable): New method for controling GC.
SvnClientTest#test_cleanup): Use new GC related convenience
method instead of explicit GC control code.

author: giorgio_valoti
msg: translated remaining messages and fixed all fuzzy translations.

author: maxb
msg: * notes/alternate-bdb-version: Write up the results of my investigation into
linking Subversion with alternate (i.e. other than linked to APR-util)

author: maxb
msg: * configure.in: Comment tweaks. Aims to provide clearer division into sections,
de-verbosify some overly verbose comments, and use # not dnl for brief
comments so that there is some useful indication of sections in the
generated configure script, for those occasions when debugging requires
that the autoconf output be examined.

author: maxb
msg: * configure.in: Without further change, move some lines up and down in the
Apache: Up above APR, as a preparatory step future changes regarding paying
attention to what APR any found Apache is using when deciding on APR.
Neon: Alongside APR, APR-util, so that the three bundled-source libraries
DB version AC_DEFINEs: Move to be close to where the corresponding shell
$enable_debugging: Move action code to be with option detection code.
